properties.title: Muratella Train Station
properties.description: The closest train station to WFP.  Use this train station if you are using public transit to get to WFP.

properties.title: Roma Termini Train Station
properties.description: The main train station in Rome.

properties.title: Roma Trastevere Train Station
properties.description: You can take a train to WFP from here (via Muratella train station).  Train arrives on platform 5 (in italian Binario 5) toward Fiumicino Airport.
